products.name: Nivia Badminton Racket Set
products.description: Nivia badminton racket set includes 2 aluminum rackets and 3 nylon shuttlecocks. Lightweight rackets with comfortable grip. Durable aluminum frame suitable for beginners and recreational players. Pre-strung and ready to play. Comes with carrying case. Perfect for family fun, park games, or casual matches.

products.name: Think and Grow Rich
products.description: Napoleon Hill's timeless classic 'Think and Grow Rich' reveals the secrets of success learned from Andrew Carnegie and 500+ wealthy individuals. 13 principles for achieving riches and success. Positive mental attitude, visualization, and persistence. Over 100 million copies sold. Blueprint for personal achievement.

products.name: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari
products.description: Robin Sharma's inspiring fable about Julian Mantle, a successful lawyer who embarks on a spiritual journey. Discover the 7 virtues of enlightened learning, living your dreams, and finding happiness. Practical wisdom for achieving balance and fulfillment. International bestseller. Transform your life with ancient wisdom.

products.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
products.description: Harper Lee's Pulitzer Prize-winning novel set in 1930s Alabama. Young Scout Finch learns about racial injustice when her father defends a Black man wrongly accused. Timeless themes of courage, compassion, and moral growth. One of America's most beloved classics. Essential reading for all ages.

products.name: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
products.description: Stephen Covey's groundbreaking book on personal and professional effectiveness. Learn the 7 habits including 'Be Proactive,' 'Begin with the End in Mind,' and 'Seek First to Understand.' Principle-centered approach to solving problems and achieving goals. Over 40 million copies sold. Life-changing framework.

products.name: The Great Gatsby
products.description: F. Scott Fitzgerald's Jazz Age masterpiece about Jay Gatsby's obsessive love for Daisy Buchanan. Set in 1920s Long Island, exploring themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream. Lyrical prose and unforgettable characters. Considered one of the greatest American novels. Essential classic literature.

products.name: The Power of Your Subconscious Mind
products.description: Dr. Joseph Murphy reveals how to unleash the power of your subconscious mind to achieve health, wealth, and happiness. Scientific approach to prayer and meditation. Practical techniques to overcome fears, bad habits, and negative thinking. Over 5 million copies sold. Transform your life from within.

products.name: Decathlon Yoga Mat 8mm
products.description: Premium Decathlon yoga mat with 8mm thickness for superior cushioning. Non-slip textured surface provides excellent grip even during intense workouts. Made from eco-friendly NBR foam. Lightweight and portable with carry strap. Easy to clean. Size: 183x61cm. Perfect for yoga, pilates, stretching, and home workouts.

products.name: Cosco Cricket Bat English Willow
products.description: Professional Cosco cricket bat made from Grade 2 English willow. Full size for adults with thick edges and large sweet spot. Pre-knocked and oiled, ready to play. Traditional shape with oval handle and cane grip. Weighs 1150-1200g. Perfect for hard tennis ball and leather ball cricket.

products.name: Fitbit Charge 5 Fitness Tracker
products.description: Advanced Fitbit Charge 5 tracks heart rate, stress, sleep, and 20+ exercise modes. Built-in GPS for pace and distance. Daily Readiness Score tells you when to workout or recover. ECG app and SpO2 monitoring. 7-day battery life. AMOLED display. Water resistant. Includes 6-month Premium membership.

products.name: Nivia Storm Football Size 5
products.description: Durable Nivia Storm football with 32-panel construction and machine-stitched seams. PVC cover with textured surface for better grip and control. Rubber bladder maintains air pressure. Vibrant color design with high visibility. Official Size 5 suitable for matches and training. Great value for money.

products.name: Strauss Adjustable Bench
products.description: Versatile Strauss adjustable weight bench with 7 backrest positions from decline to incline. Heavy-duty steel frame supports up to 250kg. Thick padded cushions for comfort. Foldable design for easy storage. Non-slip rubber feet. Perfect for home gym exercises including bench press, dumbbell workouts, and abs training.

products.name: Spalding NBA Basketball
products.description: Official size Spalding NBA replica basketball with deep channel design for better ball control. Premium rubber cover with pebbled surface for excellent grip. Suitable for indoor and outdoor play. Durable construction withstands regular use. Size 7 for adults. Iconic NBA logo. Feel like a pro.

products.name: Kalenji Running Shoes
products.description: Lightweight Kalenji running shoes designed for regular runners. Breathable mesh upper keeps feet cool. EVA foam midsole provides cushioning and shock absorption. Flex grooves for natural foot movement. Durable rubber outsole with good traction. Reflective details for visibility. Available in multiple colors. Comfortable for long runs.

products.name: Domyos Resistance Bands Set
products.description: Complete Domyos resistance bands set with 5 bands (Extra Light to Extra Heavy). Perfect for strength training, stretching, and physical therapy. Includes door anchor, ankle straps, and handles. Made from natural latex. Portable and lightweight. Includes carry bag and exercise guide. Total resistance up to 68kg.

products.name: Tarmak Basketball Hoop
products.description: Adjustable Tarmak basketball hoop system with shatterproof polycarbonate backboard. Height adjustable from 2.4m to 3.05m. Weather-resistant for outdoor use. Wide base fills with water or sand for stability. Easy assembly. Spring-action breakaway rim. Perfect for driveway, backyard, or playground basketball.

products.name: Levi's 501 Original Jeans
products.description: The iconic Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans with the classic straight leg design. Made from 100% cotton denim with button fly. Timeless medium stonewash finish. Sits at waist with room in the seat and thigh. The original jean since 1873. Perfect for casual everyday wear.

products.name: Zara Women's Blazer
products.description: Elevate your professional wardrobe with this sophisticated Zara women's blazer. Tailored fit with notched lapels and front button closure. Made from premium polyester blend. Functional pockets and full lining. Perfect for office wear or formal occasions. Available in classic black.

products.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star
products.description: Classic Converse Chuck Taylor All Star sneakers in timeless white. Canvas upper with iconic rubber toe cap and vulcanized rubber sole. OrthoLite cushioning for comfort. Ankle patch with star logo. High-top design provides ankle support. A wardrobe essential since 1917.

products.name: Tommy Hilfiger Polo Shirt
products.description: Classic Tommy Hilfiger men's polo shirt crafted from soft cotton piqu√©. Signature flag logo embroidered on chest. Two-button placket, ribbed collar and cuffs. Regular fit design suitable for casual and smart-casual occasions. Available in navy blue with white tipping.

products.name: H&M Skinny Fit Chinos
products.description: Versatile H&M men's skinny fit chinos in classic khaki. Made from stretch cotton twill for comfort and flexibility. Zip fly with button, side pockets, and welt back pockets. Modern tapered leg design. Perfect for smart-casual styling with shirts or t-shirts.

products.name: Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses
products.description: Iconic Ray-Ban Aviator sunglasses with classic gold metal frame and green G-15 lenses. 100% UV protection. Lightweight and durable construction. Adjustable nose pads for custom fit. Includes leather case and cleaning cloth. Timeless style since 1937.

products.name: Fossil Leather Wallet
products.description: Premium Fossil men's bifold wallet crafted from genuine leather. Multiple card slots, ID window, and bill compartments. RFID blocking technology protects your cards. Slim design fits comfortably in pocket. Fossil logo embossed on exterior. Durable and stylish.

products.name: Mango Women's Midi Dress
products.description: Elegant Mango women's midi dress in floral print. Flowing silhouette with V-neckline and short sleeves. Elastic waistband for comfortable fit. Made from lightweight, breathable fabric. Perfect for summer occasions, parties, or casual outings. Feminine and stylish.

products.name: Dell XPS 15 Laptop
products.description: Power through your workday with the Dell XPS 15 featuring Intel Core i7 12th Gen processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. The stunning 15.6" FHD+ InfinityEdge display offers vibrant colors and sharp details. Premium aluminum chassis with carbon fiber palm rest. Backlit keyboard, fingerprint reader, and Thunderbolt 4 ports. Perfect for professionals and creators.

products.name: JBL Flip 6 Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Experience powerful sound with the JBL Flip 6 portable Bluetooth speaker. IP67 waterproof and dustproof design makes it perfect for outdoor adventures. 12 hours of playtime, PartyBoost feature to pair multiple speakers. Bold design with vibrant colors. Crisp highs and deep bass in a compact package.

products.name: Logitech MX Master 3S Mouse
products.description: Ultimate precision and productivity with Logitech MX Master 3S wireless mouse. 8K DPI sensor works on any surface including glass. Quiet clicks, customizable buttons, electromagnetic scroll wheel. Ergonomic design reduces wrist strain. USB-C charging lasts 70 days. Multi-device connectivity.

products.name: Seagate 2TB External HDD
products.description: Store all your files safely with Seagate 2TB Portable External Hard Drive. USB 3.0 for fast transfer speeds up to 120MB/s. Plug-and-play compatibility with Windows and Mac. Compact and lightweight design fits in your pocket. Includes 2-year data recovery services.

products.name: TP-Link AC1750 WiFi Router
products.description: Upgrade your home network with TP-Link AC1750 dual-band WiFi router delivering speeds up to 1750Mbps. Three external antennas ensure strong WiFi coverage. Gigabit ports for wired devices. Parental controls and guest network. Easy setup with Tether app. Perfect for 4K streaming and gaming.

products.name: Kindle Paperwhite E-Reader
products.description: Read comfortably for hours with Kindle Paperwhite featuring a glare-free 6.8" display that reads like real paper, even in bright sunlight. Waterproof design (IPX8), adjustable warm light, 8GB storage holds thousands of books. Weeks of battery life. Access millions of books, magazines, and audiobooks.

products.name: Corsair K70 RGB Gaming Keyboard
products.description: Dominate every game with Corsair K70 RGB mechanical gaming keyboard featuring Cherry MX switches for precise, responsive keystrokes. Per-key RGB backlighting with dynamic effects. Durable aluminum frame. Dedicated media controls and USB passthrough. Anti-ghosting and full N-key rollover.

products.name: Xiaomi Mi Band 7 Fitness Tracker
products.description: Track your health and fitness with Mi Band 7 featuring 1.62" AMOLED display, 24/7 heart rate monitoring, SpO2 tracking, and sleep analysis. 110+ sports modes, 5ATM water resistance. 14-day battery life. Smart notifications, weather updates, and music control from your wrist.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II
products.description: Immerse yourself in premium sound with Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II featuring world-class noise cancellation that adapts to your ears and environment. CustomTune technology personalizes sound. 6-hour battery plus 18 hours with case. Touch controls, transparency mode, and IPX4 water resistance.

products.name: GoPro HERO11 Black
products.description: Capture stunning 5.3K60 video and 27MP photos with GoPro HERO11 Black action camera. Revolutionary new image sensor with HyperSmooth 5.0 stabilization. Waterproof to 33ft, rugged and durable. Night effects, TimeWarp 3.0, and live streaming. Voice control and touch screen.

products.name: Reebok Training Shorts
products.description: Comfortable Reebok men's training shorts made from moisture-wicking Speedwick fabric. Elastic waistband with drawcord for adjustable fit. Side pockets for storage. Lightweight and breathable design. Perfect for gym workouts, running, or casual wear. Available in black.

products.name: Calvin Klein Cotton Boxer Briefs Pack
products.description: Essential Calvin Klein men's boxer briefs 3-pack in classic cotton stretch fabric. Signature elastic waistband with CK logo. Comfortable fit with contour pouch. Tag-free design. Machine washable and durable. Available in black, grey, and navy. Everyday comfort and style.

products.name: Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum
products.description: Powerful Dyson V11 cordless vacuum with intelligent suction that adapts to different floor types. Up to 60 minutes runtime. High torque cleaner head deep cleans carpets and hard floors. LCD screen displays performance data. Hygienic dirt ejection. Converts to handheld. HEPA filtration.

products.name: Ikea 3-Seater Sofa
products.description: Comfortable Ikea 3-seater sofa with removable washable covers. Durable polyester upholstery in classic grey. Solid wood frame ensures stability. Deep seats with thick cushions provide excellent comfort. Modern Scandinavian design fits any living room. Easy assembly with included instructions.

products.name: Nespresso Coffee Maker
products.description: Premium Nespresso Vertuo coffee maker delivers perfect espresso and coffee. One-touch brewing with Centrifusion technology. Fast heat-up in 15 seconds. Automatic capsule ejection. Large 1.2L water tank. Energy-saving auto shut-off. Includes welcome set of 12 capsules. Compact design.

products.name: Borosil Glass Mixing Bowl Set
products.description: Versatile Borosil borosilicate glass mixing bowl set (3 pieces). Heat-resistant and microwave-safe. Nesting design saves storage space. Clear glass lets you monitor mixing. Non-porous and odor-resistant. Dishwasher safe. Sizes: 500ml, 1L, 1.5L. Perfect for baking and food prep.

products.name: Godrej Interio Office Chair
products.description: Ergonomic Godrej Interio office chair with high back support and lumbar cushion. Adjustable seat height, armrests, and recline. Breathable mesh back keeps you cool. Heavy-duty nylon base with smooth-rolling casters. 360-degree swivel. Supports up to 110kg. Perfect for home office or workspace.

products.name: Sleepwell Mattress King Size
products.description: Premium Sleepwell king size mattress with dual comfort technology. High-density foam with quilted top for plush comfort. Anti-microbial treatment and hypoallergenic. 10-year warranty. Vacuum-packed for easy delivery. Size: 78x72 inches, 6-inch thickness. Perfect for restful sleep.

products.name: Milton Thermosteel Water Bottle
products.description: Keep drinks hot or cold for 24 hours with Milton Thermosteel insulated water bottle. Double-wall vacuum insulation. 100% leak-proof cap. Made from food-grade stainless steel. BPA-free. Easy to clean. Compact 1L capacity fits in bag. Perfect for office, gym, or travel.

products.name: Solimo Cotton Bed Sheet Set
products.description: Soft Solimo 100% cotton bed sheet set for double bed. Includes 1 flat sheet, 1 fitted sheet, and 2 pillow covers. 300 thread count for smooth feel. Breathable and durable. Machine washable and fade-resistant. Available in elegant grey. Perfect for everyday comfort.

products.name: Havells Table Fan 400mm
products.description: Powerful Havells 400mm table fan with 3-speed settings. High air delivery with low noise. 90-degree adjustable tilt. Durable ABS blades and metal body. Overheat protection. Energy-efficient motor. 2-year warranty. Perfect for personal cooling in bedroom, office, or study room.

products.name: Amazon Basics Microwave Oven
products.description: Convenient Amazon Basics 20L solo microwave oven with 700W power. 5 power levels for versatile cooking. Digital display with touch controls. Pre-set menus for common foods. Child safety lock. Rotating turntable ensures even heating. Compact design saves counter space. 1-year warranty.

products.name: Sapiens by Yuval Noah Harari
products.description: Explore the history of humankind with 'Sapiens' by Yuval Noah Harari. From Stone Age to modern times, discover how Homo sapiens came to dominate the world. Thought-provoking insights on culture, religion, capitalism, and our future. International bestseller with 23 million copies sold. Essential reading for understanding humanity.

products.name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
products.description: Robert Kiyosaki's #1 personal finance book 'Rich Dad Poor Dad' teaches what the rich teach their kids about money. Learn the difference between assets and liabilities, how to make money work for you, and achieve financial independence. Over 40 million copies sold worldwide. Life-changing financial wisdom.

products.name: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
products.description: Mark Manson's counterintuitive approach to living a good life. Learn to let go of what doesn't matter and focus on what truly does. Refreshingly honest advice about accepting limitations and embracing uncertainty. New York Times bestseller with over 10 million copies sold. Witty, practical, and life-affirming.

products.name: 1984 by George Orwell
products.description: George Orwell's dystopian masterpiece '1984' depicts a totalitarian future where Big Brother watches everything. Winston Smith rebels against omnipresent government surveillance and propaganda. Thought-provoking exploration of truth, freedom, and reality. Essential classic that defined modern dystopian fiction. More relevant than ever.

products.name: Apple MacBook Pro 14
products.description: Unleash your creativity with the MacBook Pro 14" powered by the revolutionary M3 Pro chip. Experience up to 18x faster performance than Intel-based models, with 18GB unified memory for effortless multitasking. The stunning 14.2" Liquid Retina XDR display delivers 1000 nits sustained brightness and 1600 nits peak HDR brightness with P3 wide color gamut. Enjoy up to 18 hours of battery life, six Thunderbolt 4 ports, HDMI, SDXC card slot, and a 1080p FaceTime HD camera. Premium aluminum unibody design with Magic Keyboard and Force Touch trackpad. Ideal for video editors, developers, designers, and creative professionals who demand the best performance.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
products.description: Immerse yourself in pure sound with Sony's flagship WH-1000XM5 wireless headphones. Industry-leading noise cancellation with 8 microphones and dual processors blocks out ambient noise completely. Enjoy exceptional audio quality with 30mm drivers supporting Hi-Res Audio and LDAC codec. Ultra-comfortable lightweight design with soft-fit leather for all-day wear. Incredible 30-hour battery life with quick charging (3 min charge = 3 hours playback). Multipoint connection lets you switch between devices seamlessly. Speak-to-Chat automatically pauses music when you speak. Includes carrying case, audio cable, and USB-C charging. Perfect for travelers, audiophiles, and remote workers seeking focus.

products.name: Samsung 4K Smart TV 55 Inch
products.description: Transform your living room into a home cinema with the Samsung 55" Crystal UHD 4K Smart TV. Experience stunning clarity with 3840x2160 resolution and Dynamic Crystal Color technology displaying over a billion shades for lifelike images. The powerful Crystal Processor 4K automatically upscales content to near-4K quality. Smart Hub gives instant access to Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, YouTube, and 100+ apps with built-in Alexa and Google Assistant voice control. Motion Xcelerator ensures smooth fast-action scenes. Purcolor technology delivers true-to-life colors. Gaming Mode reduces input lag. Sleek AirSlim design with 3 HDMI ports, 2 USB ports, WiFi, and Bluetooth. Perfect for families, movie lovers, and gamers.

products.name: Canon EOS M50 Mark II
products.description: Capture stunning photos and videos with the Canon EOS M50 Mark II mirrorless camera. Features a powerful 24.1MP APS-C CMOS sensor and DIGIC 8 processor for exceptional image quality even in low light. Record crystal-clear 4K UHD 24p video with Dual Pixel CMOS AF for smooth autofocus tracking. The 3.0" vari-angle touchscreen LCD flips out for perfect selfies and vlogging. Eye Detection AF ensures sharp portraits. Built-in WiFi and Bluetooth enable instant photo transfer to smartphone via Canon Camera Connect app. Includes vertical video support for social media creators. Compatible with EF-M lenses. Bundle includes 15-45mm kit lens, battery, charger, and strap. Perfect for vloggers, content creators, photography enthusiasts, and aspiring professionals.

products.name: Nike Air Max 270 Running Shoes
products.description: Step into ultimate comfort with the Nike Air Max 270 featuring the brand's biggest heel Air unit yet for incredible cushioning with every step. The engineered mesh upper provides breathability and flexibility while maintaining structured support. The revolutionary 270 degrees of visible Max Air technology delivers all-day comfort whether you're running, training, or going about your daily routine. Foam midsole adds extra plush comfort. Rubber outsole with strategic tread pattern ensures excellent traction on various surfaces. The sleek modern design with bold Nike swoosh logo makes a style statement. Pull tabs on tongue and heel allow easy on and off. Available in multiple colorways. Perfect for runners, fitness enthusiasts, sneakerheads, and anyone seeking the perfect blend of performance, comfort, and street style.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
products.description: Experience the pinnacle of smartphone technology with the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra. Features a revolutionary 200MP main camera with advanced Nightography for crystal-clear photos in any lighting. Powered by the blazing-fast Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor for seamless gaming, multitasking, and content creation. The built-in S Pen transforms your phone into a creative workspace with precision note-taking and drawing. Enjoy the stunning 6.8" Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with 120Hz refresh rate and Vision Booster for outdoor visibility. All-day power with 5000mAh battery, IP68 water resistance, and premium glass design. Perfect for professionals, photographers, and power users.

products.name: Atomic Habits by James Clear
products.description: Transform your life one tiny change at a time with "Atomic Habits" by James Clear, the #1 New York Times bestseller that has sold over 10 million copies worldwide. This groundbreaking book reveals the surprising power of small habits and how making tiny changes can lead to remarkable results. Clear draws on cutting-edge psychology, neuroscience, and real-world examples to explain how habits form and, most importantly, how to break bad ones and build good ones that stick. Learn the Four Laws of Behavior Change, the proven framework for improving every day. Discover strategies used by Olympic athletes, Fortune 500 companies, and championship-winning coaches. The book provides practical tactics for forming good habits, breaking bad ones, and mastering the tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results. With 320 pages of actionable insights, clear explanations, and engaging stories, this is your blueprint for personal and professional growth. Perfect for entrepreneurs, students, professionals, and anyone committed to continuous self-improvement and achieving their goals.

products.name: Harry Potter Box Set
products.description: Enter the magical world of Hogwarts with the complete Harry Potter Box Set featuring all 7 books by J.K. Rowling in a beautiful collector's edition. Follow Harry's incredible journey from an orphaned boy living under the stairs to the wizard who saved the wizarding world. This complete collection includes: The Philosopher's Stone, Chamber of Secrets, Prisoner of Azkaban, Goblet of Fire, Order of the Phoenix, Half-Blood Prince, and Deathly Hallows. Experience the epic tale of friendship, courage, love, and the eternal battle between good and evil that has captivated readers of all ages worldwide. Each book is beautifully bound with stunning cover art. The series offers rich character development, intricate plot lines, and a fully realized magical universe complete with spells, potions, magical creatures, and unforgettable characters like Hermione, Ron, Dumbledore, and Snape. Perfect for introducing young readers to the joy of reading or for adult fans wanting to relive the magic. Ideal gift for birthdays, holidays, or Harry Potter enthusiasts. A timeless treasure for any home library.

products.name: Adidas Men's T-Shirt
products.description: Stay cool and comfortable during workouts with the Adidas Men's Sports T-Shirt featuring advanced moisture-wicking Climalite technology that pulls sweat away from your skin for rapid evaporation. Made from premium soft cotton blend fabric that feels great against your skin while providing excellent breathability. The regular fit design ensures freedom of movement for all athletic activities including gym workouts, running, yoga, or casual wear. Features the iconic Adidas 3-Stripes on sleeves and logo on chest. Ribbed crew neck maintains its shape wash after wash. The quick-dry fabric makes it perfect for intense training sessions. Available in multiple colors and sizes. Machine washable and designed for durability. Ideal for athletes, fitness enthusiasts, and active individuals who demand performance and comfort without compromising on style.

products.name: Puma Women's Sports Jacket
products.description: Elevate your activewear collection with the Puma Women's Sports Jacket combining style, functionality, and performance. Crafted from high-quality polyester with a soft fleece lining for warmth without weight. The full-zip front closure allows easy on-off and adjustable ventilation. Two deep side pockets with zipper closures securely store your phone, keys, and essentials. The athletic fit is designed specifically for women's body shape, offering comfort without restriction during workouts or outdoor activities. Features the signature Puma cat logo, ribbed cuffs and hem to seal in warmth, and a stand-up collar for neck protection. Water-resistant outer layer repels light rain. Available in stylish colors. Perfect for running, gym sessions, outdoor sports, yoga, or casual athleisure wear. Ideal for active women who value quality, style, and versatility.

products.name: Philips Air Fryer HD9252/90
products.description: Cook healthier delicious meals with up to 90% less fat using the Philips Air Fryer featuring patented Rapid Air Technology that circulates hot air to fry, bake, grill, and roast with little to no oil. The spacious 4.1L capacity basket is perfect for preparing meals for 4-5 people - cook a whole chicken, 1kg of fries, or multiple servings at once. Digital touchscreen display with 7 preset cooking programs for fries, meat, fish, chicken, cake, and more takes the guesswork out of cooking. Adjustable temperature control up to 200¬∞C and 60-minute timer with auto-shut off. The non-stick basket and removable drawer are dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. QuickClean basket with unique design prevents food sticking. Includes recipe book with 30+ recipes. Safety features include cool-touch housing and non-slip feet. Perfect for health-conscious families, busy professionals, and anyone looking to enjoy crispy fried foods guilt-free.

products.name: Prestige Induction Cooktop
products.description: Experience fast, safe, and energy-efficient cooking with the Prestige 2000W Induction Cooktop that heats food 50% faster than traditional gas stoves while consuming less electricity. The advanced induction technology transfers heat directly to the cookware for precise temperature control and even cooking. Features 8 preset cooking menus including fry, boil, steam, curry, and more with automatic temperature and time settings. Push-button controls with LED display allow easy operation. Auto shut-off feature activates when no cookware is detected, providing safety and energy savings. Overheat protection and voltage surge protection ensure durability. The feather-touch buttons and elegant black glass top are easy to clean - just wipe with a damp cloth. Compatible with induction-ready cookware (ferromagnetic base). Includes free induction-compatible pan. Perfect for modern kitchens, small apartments, hostels, and anyone seeking convenient, safe cooking.

products.name: The Alchemist by Paulo Coelho
products.description: Embark on a transformative journey with Paulo Coelho's masterpiece "The Alchemist," a timeless international bestseller that has inspired millions of readers worldwide in over 80 languages. Follow the enchanting tale of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who dreams of finding treasure at the Egyptian pyramids. This philosophical novel beautifully explores themes of destiny, personal legends, and listening to your heart. Coelho's simple yet profound prose delivers powerful life lessons about courage, following your dreams, and finding meaning in the journey itself. The book teaches that when you truly desire something, the entire universe conspires to help you achieve it. With 197 pages of wisdom, this quick read leaves a lasting impact on readers of all ages. Perfect for book club discussions, gift-giving, or personal reflection. Essential reading for dreamers, travelers, spiritual seekers, and anyone standing at life's crossroads seeking inspiration and direction.

products.name: Yonex Badminton Racket
products.description: Dominate the court with the Yonex professional-grade badminton racket crafted from premium high-modulus carbon fiber for exceptional strength-to-weight ratio. At just 85g (unstrung), this ultra-lightweight racket enables lightning-fast reactions, powerful smashes, and precise net shots without causing arm fatigue. The isometric head shape expands the sweet spot by 7% compared to conventional round frames, providing more consistent power even on off-center hits. Aero-Frame design reduces air resistance for faster swing speed. Built-in T-Joint technology reinforces the connection between frame and shaft for enhanced durability and torque. G4 grip size fits most hand sizes comfortably with anti-slip texture. Recommended string tension: 24-26 lbs. Comes with protective full-length cover. Suitable for intermediate to advanced players. Perfect for competitive tournaments, club matches, serious training, and players looking to improve their game with professional-quality equipment trusted by Olympic champions.

products.name: Puma Gym Bag
products.description: Stay organized on the go with the Puma Gym Duffle Bag featuring a spacious 40-liter capacity perfect for gym sessions, weekend trips, or sports practice. The main compartment easily fits workout clothes, shoes, towel, and more, while multiple specialized compartments keep your gear organized. Dedicated ventilated shoe compartment with moisture barrier keeps sweaty shoes separate from clean clothes. Zippered side pocket for water bottle. Front quick-access pocket for phone, keys, wallet, and essentials. Internal zippered pocket for valuables. Made from durable water-resistant polyester fabric that withstands daily wear and tear. Padded adjustable shoulder strap for comfortable carrying, plus dual top handles for grab-and-go convenience. YKK zippers ensure smooth operation and longevity. Features the iconic Puma logo. Available in stylish colorways. Compact yet spacious design. Perfect for gym-goers, athletes, travelers, students, and active individuals who need reliable, stylish gear transportation for workouts, sports, or weekend adventures.
